arts.ttl: Thomas Frank gives definitive title race verdict after Liverpool late show at Brentford
arts.sum: Brentford boss Thomas Frank thought his side had held off the Premier League leaders and would be earning a point - only for two late Darwin Nunez goals to hand Liverpool victory in London

arts.ttl: Brentford boss Thomas Frank claims Liverpool are the 'best team in the Premier League and WORLD' after late win over Bees
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT THE GTECH COMMUNITY STADIUM: The Dane's Bees team put in a valiant fight against Arne Slot's side but were ultimately downed by two stoppage-time goals from Nunez.

arts.ttl: Darwin Nunez Lucky to Avoid Red Card in Brentford 0-2 Liverpool
arts.sum: The Uruguayan scored Liverpool's two goals of the affair - but is being lambasted for his 95th minute challenge on Nathan Collins.

arts.ttl: ‘Very impressed’ Liverpool boss Slot praises Brentford
arts.sum: Arne Slot praised Brentford for their performance after his dominant Liverpool side left it late to clinch a 2-0 win against the Bees. Substitute Darwin Nunez killed off admirable resistance from the home team, with the Uruguayan netting both goals just when it appeared that Brentford had done enough to secure a hard-fought point. “I […] The post ‘Very impressed’ Liverpool boss Slot praises Brentford appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Redemption for Núñez as late, late goals at Brentford boost Liverpool title bid
arts.sum: Darwin Núñez has had his doubters this season, and poor form has led to rumours of a January transfer. He answered his critics with a late, match-winning double at Brentford.
How we rated the players, The post Brentford v Liverpool player ratings appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Frank happy with Brentford’s display – and says Liverpool are a ‘level above’ Man City and Arsenal
arts.sum: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta and Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola are hoping Liverpool slip up under Arne Slot – but Darwin Nunez gave them victory at Brentford. Thomas Frank was pleased with what he saw from his Brentford side even though two late goals condemned them to defeat against Liverpool. arts.ttl: Arne Slot says Liverpool players proved him wrong with late win at Brentford
arts.sum: Darwin Nunez came off the bench to score a stoppage-time double.

arts.ttl: “For me…”: Thomas Frank reveals why Liverpool are “a level above” Arsenal & Man City
arts.sum: Liverpool picked up a vital win over Brentford in the Premier League earlier today, and Thomas Frank has heaped praise on the league leaders for their complete performance. Despite dominating for most of the game, Liverpool were struggling to find the lack of the net. arts.ttl: Liverpool dubbed the ‘best team in the world’ following Brentford win
arts.sum: Liverpool are the best football team “in the world”, according to Brentford boss Thomas Frank. Darwin Nunez came off the bench to break the Bees’ resolve with a dramatic stoppage-time brace at the Gtech Community Stadium on Saturday and hand the Reds their 15th Premier League win of the season. “I thought we played a […] The post Liverpool dubbed the ‘best team in the world’ following Brentford win first appeared on The Football Faithful.
